direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods retrieve the class type based on a character input, with getValueType being the newer, non-deprecated version.
Both methods process character inputs to determine if they represent specific types or codes.
Both methods involve parsing and interpreting character-based patterns to determine types or options.
Both methods involve creating or retrieving class types, though one is based on a character and the other on a string.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require URL parser initialization.
Environment setup is required before validating URLs.
Both methods verify URL formats and handle similar exceptions.
